name: Yie Ar Kung-Fu II: The Emperor Of Yie-Gah
overview: It was just twenty years ago that LEE, the Kung Fu Master, wiped out the dastardly Chop Suey Gang. But one member of the gang managed to survive... YEN PEI now calls himself the Yie Gah Emperor, and with his seven warlords, he has extended his evil influence throughout China. LEE's son, LEE YOUNG, has come forth to meet this evil emperor. To the deadly killing arts of Kung Fu which he learned from his father, he has added his own special techniques. Help LEE YOUNG to use his Kung Fu against the Yie Gah Emperor!! For use with ONE or TWO players
